name: core
description: A yearly Magic core set (Tenth Edition, etc)

name: expansion
description: A rotational expansion set in a block (Zendikar, etc)

name: masters
description: A reprint set that contains no new cards (Modern Masters, etc)

name: draft_innovation
description: Special draft sets, like Conspiracy and Battlebond

name: treasure_chest
description: Magic Online treasure chest prize sets

name: funny
description: A funny un-set or set with funny promos (Unglued, Happy Holidays, etc)

name: promo
description: A set that contains purely promotional cards

name: token
description: A set made up of tokens and emblems.

name: memorabilia
description: A set made up of gold-bordered, oversize, or trophy cards that are not legal
